h2_title: How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees
content: The Transformations menu applies to any Transformation spells you collect and you'll find skills to improve might recovery, maximum health when transformed, increased defense, and more.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Skills_to_Unlock.md', within the main section titled 'Best Skills to Unlock', specifically from the subsection 'How to Understand the Mid-to-Late Game Skills Trees'.
The content is as follows:
The Transformations menu applies to any Transformation spells you collect and you'll find skills to improve might recovery, maximum health when transformed, increased defense, and more.
